Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Major in music or consent of chairperson; audition.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MVK 1111 with grade of "C" (2.0) or better or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Continuation of MVK 1111. Music majors only; not open to music majors whose major performing medium is piano.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Music major or Musical Theatre major

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Class instruction for beginning piano students. Not open to music majors whose major performing medium is piano.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MVK 1411 and competence determined by faculty jury.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MVK 2121 with grade of "C" (2.0) or better or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Continuation of MVK 2121. Music majors only; not open to music majors whose major instrument is piano.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Methods, materials for teaching individuals and classes of children and adults beginning to intermediate levels; demonstration and observation of procedures.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MVK 3431 and competence determined by faculty jury.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Intensive advanced performance study of the piano, for performance majors.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MVK 2421 and competence determined by faculty jury.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Continued study of performance skills of the piano, with additional intensive work expected for performance majors.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Advanced instruction in piano. Intended for non-music majors.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MVK 1112 with grade of "C" (2.0) or better or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Continuation of MVK 1112. Music majors only; not open to music majors whose major instrument is piano.
